comments.body: Butchers don't appear naturally?
there already is a butcher house

I love this idea, but I have a few things I think you should change.

First off, the draglins seem like a much more fitting mob for the End.

Secondly, I think you need to go into more detail about their bartering and what loot they give you.
Before anyone points it out, I'm aware that chainmail and saddles can already be obtained through villager trading. That's exactly why they are the perfect examples.
This is good but maybe elytra should stay in the end dimension and be more of an end game thing.
this is really cool! great idea, this should definitely be part of Minecraft
minecraft

This would allow getting sugar cane, so paper, so books (with hoglins leather). With the obsidian from the bartering and diamonds from nether fortress chests you could even be able to get an enchanting table ! That would be very cool for nether only challenges.
How about wondering piglin traders instead? Would make better sense, and they could have striders instead of llamas.

I really like this idea. This is how I would incorporate it in the game.

When you defeat the enderdragon,you can take the dragon egg and place it on a beacon as if you were cleansing the egg from whatever dark ender force used to consume it.This would give the over world a rare chance to spawn a small elemental dragon. They would be the most powerful mobs in the game that are not bosses but would be neutral. Killing them would drop their respective elemental crystal. Gathering all elemental Crystal's and crafting them all together would make an item called'kings crown' placing this in a beacon like fashion would spawn the elemental king.

Though for this to work, the ender dragon would always have to drop a dragon egg when slain

Piglins shouldn't trade literally every item exclusive to the Nether fortress; that would make them completely useless. Maybe they barter "Wasteland Explorer Maps" that lead to Nether fortresses instead?
and maybe add netherite hoes back to the trade table for java

I don't think it should attack the villager but it would be a cool easter egg if a piglin and villager met, the piglin would hold out different items to the villager and the villager would look at it with possible shaking or nodding of the head. If there is nodding of the head there might be a handoff, and the villager would have the possibility of having the item the piglin gave it in its trades. After this happens both will go there separate ways.

This type of mob would be amazing for the new Soulsand Valley Biome coming to the Nether! 

I can see it a a re-textured vex with fire blue skin and lava red eyes
A soul sucker for the soulsand valley would be a good idea.
I really like this idea
maybe hints about the game (stuff like: lava smelts 100 blocks)
Maybe some could be full of clues that would lead you to treasure (like the maps) or have some that troll you with cool sounding titles then have them full of nonsense!

maybe there exist a special number of book that you have a chanse to buy from diffrent village and they can be from nonsen to small stories 

only bought by the librarien ofcures

sorry for my spelling

perhaps they could be lore related, like records of early encounters with players and how common they used to be, an ancient story about an encounter with the wither, (which would explain red sand blocks) or even a story from the time pillagers and villagers lived together...

Or they could be useless but funny fables about cats and creepers or something.
Not sure about this but watched one sleep in a minecart next to bed.
That's because they're in a minecart! They can't move around to get what they need for making new items.
You should make it obtainable from the wandering trader, but not craftable.
This will make it easier to get mob skulls
This will make it easier to get mob skulls

I think this would be an awesome addition, and it could help peaceful difficulty players. Imo, it probably shouldn’t sell mob heads though (except in Peaceful for a high price), and maybe you could trade stuff besides emeralds for certain items, like maybe crops or meat for stuff like rotten flesh, bones, gunpowder, etc., depending on the item’s difficulty to obtain in the other difficulty modes.
Not to mention it would make it easier to find the villager that you want to trade with.

Good idea, Really makes the villagers more human, If they saw an Illager around their village, they wouldn't continue with their day, they would be nervous and would fear that something bad is going to happen, good idea.
Será bom um aldeão que trabalhe com esse novo bloco de personalizar banners!
That is so minor but SO NECESSARY!!!

We're seeing the same thing. In addition, in Java, you can build an Iron Farm in the spawn chunks, and it will always produce regardless of actual player location. However, in BEDROCK, the village rules mandate that a player has to be within simulation distance in order to spawn golems. I want to leave to chop down trees and come back to a double-chest of iron. Not AFK at my farm for 3 hours for a lesser result
Plus with my experience theyre really hard to make as you need to breed villagers and ive never found a breeder that works meaning i have to do it all manually

I think this is a great idea because java villagers can only accept jobs they can pathfinder to unlike bedrock where they can kinda just take any job with in their radius. I like the whole bedrock villager system just needs reworked.
Yea, not a different mob, but a variant like villagers and frogs. I want the orange husk!
Iceologer pls
Rejected for obvious reasons.
But it would be better to be able lead villagers wouldn't it?
We already have boats, minecarts, tempting mobs to push the villager, and even just talking to the villager so they walk to you.

the rouges have 3 main structures 

1st the mountain there is a massive fortress that starts from the top of the mountain down to the deep dark.it has massive rooms and hallways full of treasures and secrets.

The woodland mansion.yh theve overtook mansions

Swamp castle this is a tall tower filled with Treasures witches ect

 

Rouges will have the original pirate design for the pillager.the evoker will have an evokers battle robe.their weapons will range from melee,ranged and potions 

A potion used to control mobs into killing machines is used by rouges

illagers have a whopping 35hp and alot of strengh

Rouges have 24hp so having illagers with you is good.

Also illagers now protect villagers so by attacking anybody that is a friendly npc then the illagers may kill ya.

Some illager stuff

illager protector these are basically brutes they are heavily armoured and wield a shield and an iron axe and rocket crossbow.they ride a heavily armoured ravager.these brutes are basically like the illager royal guard in a way they have 75hp.very very strong guards and atleast 4 spawn in a large village.

 

illagers can level up the higher the tier the stronger they get and more gear they have so by having them kill mobs,trade and basically grow they’ll become stronger but the illager protector is a different mob all together.the villagers are obviosly civilians just like illagers but villagers WONT fight they will play a big part though.

the evoker is evil because he’s just nasty heartless beast.this evoker is that evoker that was rejected.evokers and the evoker boss are different.the evoker boss is way more powerful.he summons hundreds of fangs in patterns such as plus and straight lines.he can summon fireballs at you.

his final transformation is after you kill him.he will revive and transform into a vex vampire.a blue body with massive wings he’s a vex monstrosity.capable of summoning illusions and telikinesis aswell as the rest of his attacks.shoot him so he falls to the ground his wings are tattered and weak.

he spawns in the woodland mansion where he sleeps in his secret room.he wears an evokers battle robe from dungeons.

Illagers are powerful they have from 35 to 40 and 50hp depending on the level where as rouges have 24 

Illagers have both ranged and melee weapons of any type equipped already.illagers are armed with ravagers and attack dogs.

illagers are armed with highly advanced redstone technology such as the robot which is the redesigned iron golem which is a supreme mega weapon.They also have redstone golems the rock monster these have 400hp and spawn in the underground emergency village and outpost villages (sometimes) these are powerful but the titanium robot is even more dangerous.illagers also have redstone battle suits which is a mechanical suit which buffs the illager with strengh,speed and agility.but this is top secret tech.but illagers also have wizards who work at enchanted tables and lecterns.they wear red and blue evocation robes and summon fighter allays which can summon fireballs.they can also summon alot of spells

rouges are armed with a dark magic from evokers.evokers are normal but the higher rank evokers which are harder minibosses can cast illusions and place effects on players plus evoker fangs and vexes

New professions for illagers.

enchanted table: brings a new type of illager the lazuli mage which is a powerful magic entity with a variety of powers.

1st his magical trident it can be thrown and can shoot a sonic beam.plus he can use his hands to summon evocation fangs,blue fireballs and summoning battle allays if under too much threat these allays can summon fireballs too.

Like dungeons the illagers have the redstone golem alongside the redstone robot which is another project these are different mobs 

the redstone golem is almost stronger than the warden and is built with raw iron and redstone.they can swipe,yeet and swing mobs. It has 400hp and also has some new attacks.it can magnet mobs towards it and pulse them out plus it can create a shockwave

Rouges have their own weapons

the evokers like the arch evoker can transform into vex vampires but weaker than the boss

the giant troll trolls these are massive green creatures that can smash rocks with their fists these have a particularly weird but affective attack they will sit down and leap into the air and their backside smashes into the ground if crouded but can swipe mobs too.has 160hp.trolls do live in swamp caves.

villagers can now become corrupted by the rouges  and witches turning their skin pale like a witch but are not witches.these are twisted and evil individuals who wield swords

some new features for illagers 

the illagers can be hired as your bodyguards with emeralds with an option bar in the trade system so 1 emerald will hire him until death but you can either ask him to follow or to stay and you can unhurt and get your emerald back.this works with the illager captain because he has guards too.your limit of guards is 7

The illager captian who is the eldest illager is always found riding a ravager with bodyguards.he too has a new weapon called the rapier which is from dungeons plus he is armed with a multishot and quick charge rocket crossbow.he has 90hp he’s the highest rank of illager and once he is killed the next high rank will become leader
This isn't a fanfic site

Fanfic? What do you mean fanfic?

I'm making a project well 2 big projects with other ideas linked and connected to them

I need to make a new story so you know what's happening then think up ideas over the months

Then making new posts to connect basically like a tree the trunk is the main thing and the branches are progress

Alot of progress but if any issues tell me and I'll change things around

What's fanfic anyway?

Of course ik this is feedback and suggestions site and that's mainly what I use it for

If fanfic is anything inappropriate I can tell you nothing here is fanfic. Its a project that I'm developing for mc.

Nothing rude or inappropriate here I can tell you that. 

I'm trying to add more excitement, adventure and danger to the game.

Should have known that meant fan fiction

No this is not fan fiction this is a project for the last time how on the block earth is this fanfiction its a project

Illagers and villagers are evolved human beings they have emotions and their own lives not all are bad they don’t have to be bad at all.so that’s why this project exists because villagers and illagers are my favourite characters

yh people say they r evil but I say they aren’t so I want to change them whilst adding newer threats to the game.the illagers are just another race of human that were treated differently which prevoked them and they resolved to war

 

their species squidwardocus humanitus or in other words human phase evo 2.if you can’t read what that ward is.it don’t make sense anyway I made it up it just means squidward human
I had this same idea too. Looks like a lot of people have given thought to this.
As a Player who loves the new Village Variety, I love this idea, especially with the Villager Miners.
All of these are suggested already
